longTitle.name: longTitle
longTitle.content: To regulate the issue of Hong Kong Treasury bills in Hong Kong.

preamble.name: preamble
preamble.heading: Preamble
preamble.recital: WHEREAS it may be expedient from time to time that the Chief Executive should borrow money by the issue of Hong Kong Treasury bills in Hong Kong:
AND WHEREAS it is expedient to provide in one Ordinance the terms and conditions applicable to the borrowing of money by the issue of such bills:

section.name: s1
section.heading: Short title
section.content: This Ordinance may be cited as the Hong Kong Treasury Bills (Local) Ordinance.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Power to borrow by the issue of Treasury bills
section.text: The Chief Executive whenever authorized thereto by a resolution of the Legislative Council may borrow by the issue in Hong Kong of Government Treasury bills sums not exceeding the amount specified in such resolution; and may also borrow from time to time by the issue of such Treasury bills such sums as may be required to pay off at maturity bills already lawfully issued and outstanding.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Principal of bills
section.text: The principal moneys represented by the Treasury bills issued under the provisions of this Ordinance are hereby charged upon and shall be payable out of the general revenues and assets of Hong Kong.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Proceeds of bills
section.text: The proceeds of the issue of the Treasury bills shall be paid into the general revenues.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Amounts and period of currency of bills
section.text: Every Treasury bill issued under this Ordinance shall be for the sum of ten thousand dollars or a multiple of ten thousand dollars and shall be payable at par at such time or times as the Chief Executive shall before the issue of such Treasury bill fix and determine, but not later than one year from the date of issue.

section.name: s6
section.heading: Repayment of bills
section.text: The Chief Executive shall appropriate out of the general revenues the necessary sum to pay the principal represented by the Treasury bills.

section.name: s7
section.heading: Cancellation of repaid bills
section.content: Upon repayment of the principal moneys represented by the Treasury bills, the bills shall be delivered up to the Government of Hong Kong to be cancelled.
